mapper.select: select ct.course_id,ct.course_name,ct.course_detail,ct.course_link,ct.course_pic,ct.coursetype_id,tt.coursetype_name from tb_focus ft, tb_course ct,tb_coursetype tt where ft.course_id = ct.course_id and ft.user_id = #{arg0} and ct.coursetype_id = tt.coursetype_id
mapper.insert: insert into tb_focus(focus_id, course_id, user_id) values (null, #{cid}, #{uid})
mapper.select: select * from tb_focus where course_id=#{cid} and user_id=#{uid}
mapper.delete: delete from tb_focus where user_id=#{user_id} and course_id=#{course_id}
